entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
